question: Which Indian entity became the first to get UNFCC’s (United Nation Framework Convention on Climate Change) Green Climate Fund for its Ground Water Recharge and Solar Micro Irrigation Project?
option1: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD)
answer: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD)
explanation: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) became the first Indian entity became the first to get UNFCC’s (United Nation Framework Convention on Climate Change) Green Climate Fund for its Ground Water Recharge and Solar Micro Irrigation Projects.
